EmailTemplate.description: Opportunity Prove Stage Updated by Channel Partner
EmailTemplate.name: Opportunity: Prove Stage Change Notification to Sales Rep
EmailTemplate.subject: Opportunity Stage Change Notification for {!Opportunity.Name} - Rev Rec Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Ultimate_Consignee_Account_Owner__c},
Please remember to enter the rev rec terms on the opportunity, otherwise it cannot move beyond the prove stage.
Your partner {!Opportunity.OwnerFullName} has updated the stage in Partner Portal to {!Opportunity.StageName}.
Please click on the following opportunity to view the record details in SFDC: {!Opportunity.Name}
Thank you.
